title: Michael Gove – 2022 Comments on the New Deal for Renters
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Michael Gove, the Levelling Up and Housing Secretary, on 10 May 2022.
content:
Too many renters are living in damp, unsafe and cold homes, powerless to put it right, and under the threat of sudden eviction.
